title: The Adventures of Monk the Monkey
description: Reading to your children should not be boring. If you enjoy reading to your child(ren) and have been looking for a book to captivate your child's imagination, then this is the book for you. Designed for John Edgerton Stone V who was born February 9th 2008, this book will be a favorite for children of all ages.Follow Monk the Monkey on his fun adventures.
author: John Edgerton Stone IV
